metadata.title: CVE-2015-2206 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: libraries/select_lang.lib.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.9, 4.2.xbefore 4.2.13.2, and 4.3.x before 4.3.11.1 includes invalid language valuesin unknown-language error responses that contain a CSRF token and may besent with HTTP compression, which makes it easier for remote attackers toconduct a BREACH attack and determine this token via a series of craftedrequests.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
